monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Diffusion
skills.description: 5 x 80% (400%) magical damage (neutral) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Arcane Diffusion Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 100% (500%) magical damage (neutral) Removes 3 Buffs from target

skills.name: Arcane Obliteration
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies Removes 2 Buffs from targets

skills.name: Assistance
skills.description: Every heal that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 10% chance to apply Sidekick (Buff).

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Breaking Spells
skills.description: Every magical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Buff Steal
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an allied Monster removes a Buff from an enemy, it steals that Buff instead.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Chilling Wind
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Concealed
skills.description: During its first round, this Monster has an additional 25% chance to dodge enemy hits.

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Dark Shroud
skills.description: 8 x 75% (600%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Tether and Blind.

skills.name: Darken
skills.description: Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a stack of Blind. (Stacks don't count as Debuffs)

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Enlightened
skills.description: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: 1 x 165% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Helping Hand
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (110 + 50% Magic) Applies Sidekick (Buff)

skills.name: Helping Hand Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (150 + 55% Magic) Applies Sidekick & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Initial Darkness
skills.description: Apply a stack of Blind on each enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Martial Prowess
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party evades a hit (either by dodging or by Blind), 70% chance that they gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Mass Restore
skills.description: Heal all for (200 + 70% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (175 + 40% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 50% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Multi Armor Break
skills.description: Aura: Armor Break (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Sidekick
skills.description: Aura: Sidekick (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Polar Winds
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff) - Heal all allies for (700 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Shadow Grasp
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Grasp Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 80% (160%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 110% (220%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 145% (290%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Smoke Screen
skills.description: Non-damaging actions by this Monster apply a stack of Blind on two random enemies.

skills.name: Spirit World
skills.description: Aura: Spirit Monsters in the party have an additional 8% chance to dodge enemy hits.

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: True Darkness
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party applies a Blind stack on an enemy, 30% chance to apply a random Debuff on them.

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.

skills.name: Weapon Break
skills.description: Unique Aura: Enemies with Armor Break (Debuff) get their Critical Chance decreased by 10%.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

drops.name: Skill Potion
drops.description: Grants a skill point. Can only be consumed once per Monster

drops.name: Tarot Card
drops.description: Magic +10 Health +100 - Allows this monster to receive an additional stack of Sorcery + Channel (Additional stacks are only half as strong)
